Note: "2nd state"--Annotation on poster. Signed "G. Spencer Pryse." Information pencilled in on bottom right of poster and typed title appears glued onto bottom. Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: No text.  A (Belgian?) woman tends to a dead or wounded man, apparently a civilian.  The Uhlans retire to the left.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
